about_the_game:
From the makers of the award winning, Overwhelmingly Positive-rated puzzle game 'Slayaway Camp' comes a totally bitchin' new sequel!

Skullface, Slayaway Camp’s violentest masked killer, has been trapped inside a very familiar-looking (but legally distinct!) streaming service. That means hundreds of potential new victims splattered across classic movie parodies, and — let’s face it — those unsuspecting campers aren’t going to decapitate themselves. Your hall pass for cartoonish retro horror puzzling awaits!




Step into Skullface’s blood-soaked boots or transform into a murderous lineup of horror monsters like Gourd Head, the Killer Fridge and Demon Doll. This funny tribute to ‘80s horror invites you to perfect your scare tactics. Maneuver through challenging sliding block logic puzzles, find hiding spots, collect concealed machetes and unleash gut-churning finishers to elevate your kills and help Skullface escape his digital prison.




  • Skullface is Back & Running Rampant through TERRORTUBE
  • Unlock 36 Horrifying Killers across 5 different classes with unique abilities!
  • Tons of New Puzzle Mechanics!
  • 25 Parody-Laced Puzzle Movies featuring hundreds of masterfully hand-crafted puzzle challenges!
  • Hidden machete kills for true hardcore puzzle masterminds.
  • Level-Up in Mini-Game Trials for Awesome Rewards!
  • Brand new 'Endless Mode' puts your skills to the ultimate test!



Featuring brand new single-step puzzle movement (don't worry there are plenty of ICE puzzles for the original Slayaway Camp diehards as well!) we've built upon the brain busting core mechanics of Slayaway Camp with even MORE slaughteriffic new additions like pushable crates and rolling boulders you can use to block or squish your victims with; grass and trees you can interact with to frighten your victims from adjacent spaces; super awesome pressure switches that trigger trap floors and doors and mighty lawnmowers that can run over the campers for some truly grotesque 'manscaping'.

Not only that but there are 4 new classes of killers in addition to the traditional 'Slasher' class. Sorcerers can fire projectiles across the levels, destroying obstacles and turning campers into a bloody mist! Beasts let loose a frightening roar to freeze all the campers in place. Monster class killers can create zombie friends from dead campers to help in their slaughter and the special Ghost killers are able to 'phase' through obstacles to surprise slaughter unsuspecting victims!

content_descriptors.notes: Gratuitously unnecessary cartoon violence and gallons of pixelated blood.

Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 12+
  • Processor: Both Apple Silicon & Intel chips
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 13+
  • Processor: 2020 Generation Macs and Newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Slayaway Camp 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i (i3, i5, i7) Level CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD CPU supporting 64 bit @ 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Something that uses vacuum tubes.

short_description: Take control of masked maniac Skullface in the goretastic sequel to the most violentest award winning Overwhelmingly Positive puzzle game ever made! This darkly hilarious puzzle game tribute to classic horror movies that puts the laughter in slaughter.
